issue.title: [CF 882] Serious FPS drop when using TMW
issue.body:
I am experiencing a huge FPS drop when the fight begins when using TMW. Also, my client gradually slows down if I do not reload my UI. I did a profiling test using CPU_broker(http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/brokercpu) and here are the results in screenshots. When I disable TMW everything is fine.

Here is my full profile

From what I can tell from your screenshots (since only some have times visible), TMW is using an average of 6ms of CPU time per second. Between the 4th and 5th screenshot, it averages about 12ms per second. On my system, I can get up to about 500ms per second before I see any deviation from 60 FPS.

Without screenshots that can show more conclusively that TMW is causing you framerate drops (some detailed timestamps, especially over short intervals, would be nice), there is nothing that I can do.
